Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior is grooved, covered with a light-brown slip and remains of two lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394567) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394567)
